      • submitRequest

        public io.restassured.response.Response submitRequest(java.lang.String method,
                                                      java.lang.String requestBody,
                                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters,
                                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers,
                                                      java.lang.String username,
                                                      java.lang.String password,
                                                      java.lang.String baseURI)
        Submits a REST API request of the type 'POST'/'GET'/'PUT'/'PATCH'/'DELETE'
        Parameters:
        method - [String] : Can be 'POST'/'GET'/'PUT'/'PATCH'/'DELETE' depending on type of method.
        requestBody - [String] : Request JSON.
        parameters - [Map of String, String] : Request URL parameters.
        headers - [Map of String, String] : Headers if applicable to the REST API.
        username - [String] : username for the API.
        password - [String] : password for the API.
        baseURI - [String] : baseURI for the API.
        Returns:
        [Response]

      • createSoapConnection

        public java.net.HttpURLConnection createSoapConnection(java.lang.String method,
                                                       java.lang.String soapAPIName,
                                                       java.lang.String strSoapUName,
                                                       java.lang.String strSoapPwd,
                                                       java.lang.String strURL)
                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a soap connection
        Parameters:
        method - [String] : Type of method for eg: GET, POST, etc.
        soapAPIName - [String] : SoapAPI apiName mentioned in the constants file.
        strSoapUName - [String] : SoapAPI userName mentioned in the constants file.
        strSoapPwd - [String] : SoapAPI pwd mentioned in the constants file.
        strURL - [String] : SoapAPI URL mentioned in the constants file.
        Returns:
        [HttpURLConnection]
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException is thrown in case any failure is captured
